insights.heading: 2. Methodology

insights.heading: 4. Discussion
insights.summary: Summarize the following text for a student: Discussion on document analysis.The results of this study have several implications for both research and practice. Organizations can leverage the proposed NLP-approach to improve document processing, knowledge extraction, and information retrieval. We believe this work contributes significantly to both the theoretical and theoretical understanding and practical application of document information, as well as to theoretical knowledge and understanding of information information.
